EmailTemplate.name: License Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You have met all requirements and have been issued license.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LICENSED ISSUED Hi {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}, Congratulations! You have met all requirements and have been issued the following license:
License type: {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c}
License number: {!MUSW__License2__c.Name}
Expiration date: {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Expiration_Date__c}
Access your license online! You can access and print your license by logging into your account at https://dev-polaris.cs32.force.com/Dashboard
Now that you have your license, you must:
Post your license within view of customers entering your place of business or work area; for example, a reception area or next to your work station.
· Carry your wallet card whenever you are working.
· Get your stamp or seal.
· Take required continuing education or professional development hours before your license expiration date. Go to www.dol.wa.gov/business/renew for more information.
You’ll need to renew your license on or before the expiration date of the license. We will send a courtesy email reminder to the primary email address on file for your license. Remember, your renewal is due whether or not you receive the email reminder.
Maintain your license account online! You can keep your contact information current and perform other license maintenance tasks by accessing your license account online at https://dev-polaris.cs32.force.com/Dashboard
Need help?
Website: www.dol.wa.gov
Email: testemail@dol.wa.gov
Phone: (360) 664-9999

Notary Public Commission
